com.jcabi.dynamo

Interface Table


  • @Immutable
public interface Table
    DynamoDB table.

    To get data from the table use frame() method. To create a new item in the table (or replace the existing one) use Table#put(Attributes) method.

    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Frame frame()
      Make a new frame, in order to retrieve items.
      Item put(Map<String,com.amazonaws.services.dynamodbv2.model.AttributeValue> attributes)
      Put new item there.
      Region region()
      Get back to the entire region.

    • Method Detail

      • put

        @NotNull
Item put(@NotNull
               Map<String,com.amazonaws.services.dynamodbv2.model.AttributeValue> attributes)
        Put new item there.

        It is recommended to use Attributes supplementary class, instead of a raw Map.

        Parameters:
        attributes - Attributes to save
        Returns:
        Item just created
        See Also:
        Attributes
